Class UpToDateChecker

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for detecting if a file is up-to-date.

    • Method Detail

      • isUpToDate

        public boolean isUpToDate()
        Query if the output is up to date.
        Returns:
        true if all outputs are up to date with respect to the inputs.

      • isUpToDate

        public boolean isUpToDate(long ts)
        Query if a particular output is up to date.
        Parameters:
        ts - An output timestamp.
        Returns:
        true if an output with modification time ts is up to date with respect to the input resources.

      • addInput

        public void addInput(long ts)
        Add an input timestamp.
        Parameters:
        ts - The modification time of an input source, in milliseconds since the epoch.

      • addOutput

        Add an output file to check.
        Parameters:
